title: Integrated vs. Isolated Instructional Design Workshop for Teacher Knowledge Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Pedagogical Concepts and General Understanding of Biology Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: A blended online-offline learning environment utilizing learners' personal BYOD devices, emphasizing real-time feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain theoretical differences between integrated and separate instructional methods with over 80% accuracy
Analyze PCK (Pedagogical Content Knowledge) application cases and suggest improvements using video-based assessment tools
Create a portfolio comparing and evaluating the strengths/weaknesses of two instructional methods for enhancing CK (Content Knowledge) and PCK

resources: Biology Curriculum Materials (Skin & Sensory Organs Theme)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
